lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about the selection of Dustin Pedroia of the Boston Red Sox as the 2008 American League most valuable player referred incorrectly to his standing in one statistical category. He was tied for 10th in the league in on-base percentage; he did not finish out of the top 10.
